title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7064.12 - Approved forms; informed consent, release
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7064.12 - Approved forms; informed consent, release

State Regulations
(a) Each local correctional facility shall
maintain an adequate supply of forms approved by the New York State Department
of Health for the purpose of informed consent relative to any HIV-related test
and authorization for release of confidential HIV-related
information. (b) Such forms shall
be used pursuant to the requirements of article 27-F of the Public Health Law
and this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7064.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
